statements: SELECT game_id, game_name, update_version, release_date, patch_notes FROM indie_games_updates WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM indie_games_updates WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, update_version FROM indie_games_updates WHERE game_id IN (3, 5);
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM indie_games_updates ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT game_id, game_name FROM indie_games_updates WHERE patch_notes LIKE '%bug%' ORDER BY game_id ASC;
SELECT game_name, update_version FROM indie_games_updates WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM indie_games_updates WHERE release_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT game_id, game_name, patch_notes FROM indie_games_updates WHERE release_date < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY game_name ASC;
SELECT game_name, release_date, update_version FROM indie_games_updates ORDER BY release_date DESC, game_name ASC;
SELECT game_id, game_name, update_version, release_date FROM indie_games_updates WHERE patch_notes LIKE '%bug%' ORDER BY game_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_updates;
SELECT game_id, update_date, update_description FROM game_updates WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patch_notes WHERE patch_version = '1.2';
SELECT patch_version, patch_date FROM patch_notes WHERE patch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_id, patch_version, patch_description FROM patch_notes JOIN game_updates ON patch_notes.game_id = game_updates.game_id ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_updates WHERE game_id = 1 ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT patch_id, patch_version FROM patch_notes WHERE patch_date > '2022-01-01' AND patch_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT game_id, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM game_updates GROUP BY game_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT game_id, MAX(patch_date) AS latest_patch_date FROM patch_notes GROUP BY game_id;
SELECT DISTINCT game_id, update_description FROM game_updates JOIN patch_notes ON game_updates.game_id = patch_notes.game_id WHERE patch_version = '1.0';
SELECT * FROM game_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM indie_games WHERE developer_name = 'Indie Studio';
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM indie_games WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patch_date, patch_description FROM patch_notes ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT game_id, update_description FROM game_updates WHERE game_id = 3;
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM indie_games ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT game_title, developer_name FROM indie_games WHERE game_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT game_title, game_id, release_date FROM indie_games WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01' AND developer_name='Indie Dev' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT patch_description, patch_date FROM patch_notes ORDER BY patch_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT game_id, update_description FROM game_updates WHERE LENGTH(update_description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM game_updates;
SELECT game_id, update_date FROM game_updates WHERE update_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT update_date, game_id FROM game_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT game_id, update_description FROM game_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM indie_games WHERE developer = 'Indie Studio' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM indie_games ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT game_title, developer FROM indie_games WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT game_title, developer, release_date FROM indie_games WHERE developer LIKE 'XYZ%';
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM indie_games INNER JOIN game_updates ON indie_games.game_id = game_updates.game_id WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patch_notes WHERE patch_version = '1.0';
SELECT game_name, release_date, developer FROM game_details ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT developer_name, founded_date FROM developer_details WHERE founded_date >= '2010-01-01';
SELECT patch_version, patch_notes FROM patch_notes WHERE patch_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT update_date, update_description FROM game_updates WHERE game_id = 123;
SELECT platform_name, company, website FROM platform_details ORDER BY platform_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT game_id, update_date, update_description FROM game_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT game_name, release_date, developer FROM game_details WHERE platform='PC' ORDER BY release_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT developer_name, founded_date FROM developer_details ORDER BY founded_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patch_id, patch_version, patch_notes FROM patch_notes WHERE patch_version LIKE '%.2%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT platform_name, company, website FROM platform_details WHERE platform_name='PlayStation' AND company='Sony' LIMIT 5;
